data.question: What is the chemical formula sum for the synthesized bimodal microporous twofold interpenetrating network?
What type of radiation was used for the diffraction measurements?
What is the maximum temperature the dehydrated form of the framework is stable up to?
True or False: The as-synthesized framework selectively exchanges the free N(CN)−2 anions with N−3 anions.
What is the symmetry space group name for the crystal structure?
What is the effect of exchanging N(CN)−2 anions with N−3 anions on the framework?
data.answer: It leads to an increase in the effective pore size or the framework’s permanent porosity.

data.question: True or False: The adsorption of water began in the lower-P/P0 region and ended without saturation being reached.
What phenomenon is observed with methanol sorption?
data.answer: A stepwise sorption with a large hysteresis.

data.question: True or False: The framework shows a highly selective sorption behaviour towards different adsorbates.
What is the crystallographic c axis dimension for the hexagonal channel?
What is the phenomenon called when the framework undergoes stress relaxation upon dehydration?
True or False: The as-synthesized compound does not undergo any color change when exposed to aqueous NaN3 solution.
What is the micropore volume from carbon dioxide adsorption according to the Dubinin–Radushkevich data?
What is the effect of dehydration on the crystal color?
data.answer: It changes from violet to deep blue.

data.question: True or False: The rehydrated crystal shows the same structure as the as-synthesized framework.
What is the crystallographic space group number for the structure?
What is the significance of the C–H...π and π–π interactions in the framework?
data.answer: They are responsible for stabilizing the overall three-dimensional architecture and topology of the framework.

data.question: True or False: The anion exchange process with N−3 anions is reversible.
What is the phenomenon called when an anion guest molecule in one channel controls the guest sorption in another channel?
True or False: The framework maintains its robustness and structural integrity upon guest molecule storage.
